title: Kamisama Hajimemashita: Kamisama, Shiawase ni Naru
synopsis: Nanami Momozono, current land god of Mikage Shrine, and her fox familiar Tomoe have faced many obstacles during their time together, but none so challenging as the one posed by the wealth god Ookununishi—if Tomoe’s wish to be human is granted, he must learn to live as one, and Nanami will have to return to being a human.
voices: ['Tachibana, Shinnosuke', 'Mimori, Suzuko', 'Okamoto, Nobuhiko', 'Kishio, Daisuke', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Ookubo, Chika', 'Matsui, Naoko', 'Morikubo, Shoutarou', 'Satou, Satomi', 'Shimizu, Kaori']
